basics.name: Sergei Shilko
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Hi, I am Sergei Shilko, i graduated in 2010 MS Psychology with study on role of personal characteristics in a successful Software/IT career. Since first year in university i already worked for IT company and now i have more than 10 years of experience in Web/IT engineering. I managed work on multiple software projects ranging from small plugins and internal IT systems to build from scratch backend systems for high load. My expertise domains are Web, Mobile and APIs for backend applications.  I like to solve technical and business problems with focus on client requirements and working closely with product teams.
